00001 from cheques.models import Account, Cheque, ChequeBook, Employee, Customer, Transaction
00002 import datetime
00003 from datetime import timedelta
00004 from django.forms.fields import DateField, TimeField, ChoiceField, MultipleChoiceField
00005 from django import forms
00006 from django.forms.widgets import RadioSelect

00010 ## Creates a cheque payment form with the fields:cheque number - six digit number present on the cheque,amount - Amount present on the cheque,cheque date - Date present on the cheque,payee name - Payee name present on the cheque, 
00011 class ChequePaymentForm(forms.Form):
00012         cheque_number=forms.IntegerField()
00013         amount=forms.DecimalField(max_digits=50, decimal_places=2)
00014         cheque_date=forms.DateField(widget=forms.TextInput(attrs={'size':'8'}))
00015         payee_name=forms.CharField()
00016

00018 ## Creates a Employee login form with the following fields:employee id - Id of the employee, password -password of the employee
00019 class EmployeeLoginForm(forms.Form):
00020         employee_id = forms.CharField(max_length=50)
00021         password = forms.CharField(widget=forms.PasswordInput())
00022 
00023 ## Creates a Customer login form with the following fields: customer id - Id of the employee, password -password of the employee
00024 class CustomerLoginForm(forms.Form):
00025         username = forms.CharField(max_length=50)
00026         password = forms.CharField(widget=forms.PasswordInput())

00029 ## Creates a form for searching account number with the following field: Enter Account number - Account number of the drawee 
00030 class SearchAccountNumberForm(forms.Form):
00031         account_number = forms.CharField(max_length=50)

00034 ## Choices for size of cheque book
00035 SIZE_CHOICES = (('20', 20), ('50', 50))
00036 
00037 ## Creates a cheque book issue form with the radio field:size - choices 20 and 50
00038 
00039 class IssueChequeBookForm(forms.Form):
00040         size=ChoiceField(widget=RadioSelect, choices=SIZE_CHOICES)
00041         value1=datetime.date.today()
00042         issueDate=DateField(initial=value1, widget=forms.widgets.HiddenInput())
00043 
00044 ## Creates a cheque cancellation form with the field:cheque number - six digit number present on the cheque
00045 class ChequeCancellationForm(forms.Form):
00046         cheque_number=forms.IntegerField()
